description: Manage MLS chat opt-in status (consolidates optIn + optOut + getOptInStatus + getChatRequestSettings + updateChatRequestSettings + acceptChatRequest + declineChatRequest + sendChatRequest)

main.description: Manage MLS chat participation. Supports opting in/out, checking status for multiple DIDs, and managing chat request settings.

action.description: Action to perform: 'optIn' enables MLS chat, 'optOut' disables it, 'getStatus' checks opt-in status for one or more DIDs, 'getSettings' retrieves chat request settings, 'updateSettings' updates chat request settings

dids.description: DIDs to check status for (used with 'getStatus' action)

allowFollowersBypass.description: Allow followers to bypass chat request approval (for 'updateSettings' action)

allowFollowingBypass.description: Allow accounts you follow to bypass chat request approval (for 'updateSettings' action)

autoExpireDays.description: Auto-expire pending chat requests after N days, 0 = no expiry (for 'updateSettings' action)

optedIn.description: Current opt-in status of the caller (for 'optIn'/'optOut')

allowFollowersBypass.description: Whether followers can bypass chat request approval (for 'getSettings'/'updateSettings')

allowFollowingBypass.description: Whether accounts you follow can bypass chat request approval (for 'getSettings'/'updateSettings')

autoExpireDays.description: Auto-expire pending chat requests after N days (for 'getSettings'/'updateSettings')

optedIn.description: Whether the user has opted into MLS chat

optedInAt.description: When the user opted in (if applicable)
